languages.text: "Именно, и этим почти горжусь — какой арбитр опустится до того, чтобы праздно проводить время или, Трон упаси, танцевать?"
"You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"
languages.original_text: "Именно, и этим почти горжусь — какой арбитр опустится до того, чтобы праздно проводить время или, Трон упаси, танцевать?"

traits.locale_text: "You are exactly right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"
"You are exactly right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"
"You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"
"You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"
"You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"
"You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"

languages.text: 「まったくそのとおりです。むしろそれを誇りに思っています。どんなアービトレイターが、怠惰な享楽に身を落としたり、ましてや─皇帝の御名にかけて─ダンスを踊ったりするのですか？」
languages.original_text: "You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"

traits.locale_text: 「まったくそのとおりです。むしろそれを誇りに思っています。どんなアービトレイターが、怠惰な享楽に身を落としたり、ましてや─皇帝の御名にかけて─ダンスを踊ったりするのですか？」

languages.text: "Da habt Ihr recht, und ich bin fast stolz darauf – was für ein Arbitrator würde sich zu banaler Lustbarkeit herablassen oder, der Thron bewahre, sogar tanzen?"
languages.original_text: "You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"

traits.locale_text: "Da habt Ihr recht, und ich bin fast stolz darauf – was für ein Arbitrator würde sich zu banaler Lustbarkeit herablassen oder, der Thron bewahre, sogar tanzen?"

languages.text: « Vous avez tout à fait raison, et j'en suis presque fier : quel genre d'arbitrator serais-je si je consentais à prendre part à des fêtes oiseuses, ou pire, le Trône m'en préserve... si j'acceptais une invitation à danser ? »
languages.original_text: "You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez tout à fait raison, et j'en suis presque fier : quel genre d'arbitrator serais-je si je consentais à prendre part à des fêtes oiseuses, ou pire, le Trône m'en préserve... si j'acceptais une invitation à danser ? »

languages.text: «Tiene mucha razón, y casi me enorgullezco de ello; ¿qué clase de Arbitrator se rebajaría a una vulgar juerga o, el Trono no lo quiera, a bailar?».
languages.original_text: "You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"

traits.locale_text: «Tiene mucha razón, y casi me enorgullezco de ello; ¿qué clase de Arbitrator se rebajaría a una vulgar juerga o, el Trono no lo quiera, a bailar?».

languages.text: “你说得没错，而且这几乎会让我我感到自豪。黄金王座在上，到底是什么样的法务官，才会堕落到享受无聊的狂欢，甚至舞蹈呢？”
languages.original_text: "You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，而且这几乎会让我我感到自豪。黄金王座在上，到底是什么样的法务官，才会堕落到享受无聊的狂欢，甚至舞蹈呢？”

languages.text: "Çok haklısınız, bununla neredeyse gurur duyuyorum. Ne tür bir Yargıcı lüzumsuz eğlencelere bulaşır? Hatta Taht korusun, dans etmeye tenezzül eder?"
languages.original_text: "You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"

traits.locale_text: "Çok haklısınız ve bununla neredeyse gurur duyuyorum. Ne tür bir Yargıcı lüzumsuz eğlencelere bulaşır, hatta Taht korusun, dans etmeye tenezzül eder?"

languages.original_text: "You are quite right, and I am almost proud of it — what kind of Arbitrator would stoop to idle revelry, or, Throne forbid, dancing?"
